headline.main: Liberty and Security in the Age of Terror

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Attorney General John Ashcroft says, ''Foreign terrorists who commit war crimes against the United States, in my judgment, are not entitled to and do not deserve the protections of the American Constitution'' (front page, Nov. 15).
abstract: Holly Gaudreau letter raises question about Atty Gen John Ashcroft's assertion that foreign terrorists who commit war crimes against United States are not entitled to protections of American constitution (Nov 15 article)
